summary: Back in the stone aged we all went to San Fransisco to escape our parents and the Vietnam war. To laugh, dance and love each other. To make love not war.
cast: Herb Caen|Thomas J. Cahill|Ronnie Davis|J. Barry Decker|Louis Gottlieb|Kurt Hirschhorn|Today Malone|Ellis D. Sox|W.A. Reverend Williams
title: The Hippie Revolution
